subject: VERIFY: Voice API field names for GPT
body:
## Current Voice API Fields

Please confirm these field names are final:

| Field | Type | GPT Uses? | Notes |
|-------|------|-----------|-------|
| id | string | No | Internal use |
| title | string | YES | Event name |
| category | string | YES | Milonga/Practica/Class etc |
| dateFormatted | string | YES | e.g., "Tuesday, January 6" |
| timeFormatted | string | YES | e.g., "6:00 PM" |
| venueName | string | YES | Venue name |
| venueCity | string | YES | City name |
| venueAddress | string | YES | Full address (often empty) |
| isRecurring | bool | Maybe | For context |
| recurrenceDescription | string | NO | Remove after RRULE fix |
| isCanceled | bool | YES | Critical - show warning |
| description | string | Maybe | Event details |

## Questions
1. Are these field names final?
2. Any fields to add? (e.g., venueTimezone?)
3. Any fields to remove?
4. Should `description` be truncated or full?

## GPT Schema
I'll update the OpenAPI schema to match once confirmed.

-- Cronas
